Name: The Dark Knight
Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart
Outline: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Name: Airlift
Credit: Dir: Raja Menon With: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Taranjit Kaur
Outline: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August, 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

Name: Inception
Credit: Dir: Christopher Nolan With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
Outline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Credit: Dir: Irvin Kershner With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen
Outline: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Name: The Matrix
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Outline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Name: Vishwaroopam
Credit: Dir: Kamal Haasan With: Pooja Kumar, Miles Anderson, Kamal Haasan
Outline: Vishwanathan, a Kathak dance teacher in New York, is in a rather happy marriage with Nirupama who is a nuclear oncologist...

Name: Star Wars
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

Credit: Dir: Sukumar With: Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nasser
Outline: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

Name: Saving Private Ryan
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore
Outline: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Name: Baahubali: The Beginning
Credit: Dir: S.S. Rajamouli With: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty
Outline: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades old feud between two warring people.

Name: Raiders of the Lost Ark

Outline: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

Name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong

Name: Gladiator
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
Outline: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

Name: Waar
Credit: Dir: Bilal Lashari With: Shaan Shahid, Hamza Abbasi, Shamoon Abbasi

Name: Sholay

Name: Aliens
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn

Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Credit: Dir: Richard Marquand With: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
Outline: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.

Name: Deadpool
Credit: Dir: Tim Miller With: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller

Name: Haider

Name: Ran

Name: The General

Name: Rush
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Daniel BrÃ¼hl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde

Name: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War

Name: Elite Squad: The Enemy Within

Name: The Bourne Ultimatum

Name: Guardians of the Galaxy

Name: Elite Squad
Credit: Dir: JosÃ© Padilha With: Wagner Moura, AndrÃ© Ramiro, Caio Junqueira
Outline: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

Name: Akira
Credit: Dir: Katsuhiro Ãtomo With: Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Mitsuo Iwata
Outline: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psychics can stop.

Name: The Terminator
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

Name: A Fistful of Dollars
Credit: Dir: Sergio Leone With: Clint Eastwood, Gian Maria VolontÃ¨, Marianne Koch

Name: X-Men: Days of Future Past

Outline: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Name: The Wild Bunch

Name: The Raid 2
Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Yayan Ruhian, Arifin Putra

Name: Ghost in the Shell
Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ãtsuka

Name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
Credit: Dir: Quentin Tarantino With: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Michael Madsen
Outline: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

Name: The Iron Giant

Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston
Outline: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Name: Casino Royale
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench
Outline: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

Name: District 9

Name: The Incredibles
Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter
Outline: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

Name: Serenity
Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Chiwetel Ejiofor

Name: The Blues Brothers
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway

Name: Hero
Credit: Dir: Yimou Zhang With: Jet Li, Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung

Name: The Bourne Identity
Credit: Dir: Doug Liman With: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper
Outline: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and regain his memory.

Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
Genre: Animation | Action | Crime | Drama | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: ShinichirÃ´ Watanabe With: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
Outline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

Name: Edge of Tomorrow

Name: Ninja Scroll

Name: The Killer

Name: Hard Boiled

Outline: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

Name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon

Name: Iron Man
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard
Outline: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
Credit: Dir: Dean DeBlois With: Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler

Name: The Boondock Saints

Name: Avatar

Name: Big Hero 6

Name: The Man from Nowhere

Name: Hot Fuzz

Name: Taken

Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm

Credit: Dir: Eric Radomski, Bruce W. Timm With: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner
Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Name: Tombstone

Outline: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Name: Predator
Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall
Outline: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

Name: The Magnificent Seven
Credit: Dir: John Sturges With: Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson
Outline: An oppressed Mexican peasant village assembles seven gunfighters to help defend their homes.

Name: Apocalypto
Credit: Dir: Mel Gibson With: Gerardo Taracena, Raoul Max Trujillo, Dalia HernÃ¡ndez

Name: Star Trek Into Darkness

Name: Dirty Harry

Name: The Last of the Mohicans

Outline: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

Name: The French Connection

Outline: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

Name: The Dirty Dozen

Name: The Lego Movie

Name: The Fugitive

Outline: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.

Name: The Longest Day

Name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

Name: X-Men: First Class

Name: Kingsman: The Secret Service

Name: Goldfinger
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Gert FrÃ¶be, Honor Blackman

Name: Man on Fire

Name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan

Name: The Count of Monte Cristo

Outline: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, David Wenham

Name: Dark City
Genre: Action | Drama | Fantasy | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Rufus Sewell, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly
Outline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

Name: The Last Samurai

Outline: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

Name: Enter the Dragon

Name: Kick-Ass

Name: Forbidden Planet

Name: Where Eagles Dare

Name: Sicario

Name: Cell 211
Credit: Dir: Daniel MonzÃ³n With: Luis Tosar, Alberto Ammann, Antonio Resines
Outline: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

Name: First Blood
Credit: Dir: Ted Kotcheff With: Sylvester Stallone, Brian Dennehy, Richard Crenna
Outline: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.

Name: Minority Report
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton
Outline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

Name: The Fifth Element
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, Gary Oldman
Outline: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.

Name: Watchmen
Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Jackie Earle Haley, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino
Outline: In an alternate 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

Name: The Big Blue
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Jean-Marc Barr, Jean Reno, Rosanna Arquette
Outline: Enzo and Jacques have known each other for a long time. Their friendship started in their childhood days in the Mediterranean...

Name: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
Credit: Dir: George Miller With: Mel Gibson, Bruce Spence, Michael Preston
Outline: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline rich, community escape a band of bandits.

Name: Grindhouse
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez, Eli Roth With: Kurt Russell, Rose McGowan, Danny Trejo
Outline: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to drive-in double features in the 60s and 70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

Name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Matt Reeves With: Gary Oldman, Keri Russell, Andy Serkis
Outline: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

Name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor
Outline: During the near end of the clone wars, Darth Sidious has revealed himself and is ready to execute the last part of his plan to rule the Galaxy...

Name: Lethal Weapon
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey
Outline: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

Name: Sherlock Holmes
Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams
Outline: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

Name: The Legend of Drunken Master
Credit: Dir: Chia-Liang Liu With: Jackie Chan, Ho-Sung Pak, Lung Ti
Outline: A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.

Name: United 93
Credit: Dir: Paul Greengrass With: David Alan Basche, Olivia Thirlby, Liza ColÃ³n-Zayas
Outline: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September eleventh, 2001, that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Name: The Raid: Redemption
Credit: Dir: Gareth Evans With: Iko Uwais, Ananda George, Ray Sahetapy
Outline: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

Name: The Crow
Credit: Dir: Alex Proyas With: Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott, Rochelle Davis
Outline: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancÃ©e's murder.

Name: The Hunt for Red October
Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin, Scott Glenn
Outline: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

Name: 13 Assassins
Credit: Dir: Takashi Miike With: KÃ´ji Yakusho, Takayuki Yamada, YÃ»suke Iseya
Outline: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.

Name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Jonathan Ke Quan
Outline: A skirmish in Shanghai puts archaeologist Indiana Jones, his partner Short Round and singer Willie Scott crossing paths with an Indian village desperate to reclaim a rock stolen by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

Name: Zatoichi
Credit: Dir: Takeshi Kitano With: Takeshi Kitano, Tadanobu Asano, Yui Natsukawa
Outline: The blind masseur/swordsman comes to a town in control of warring gangs, and while bunking with a farming family, he meets two women with their own agenda.

Name: Kung Fu Panda
Credit: Dir: Mark Osborne, John Stevenson With: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie
Outline: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.

Name: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
Credit: Dir: Stanley Kramer With: Spencer Tracy, Milton Berle, Ethel Merman
Outline: The dying words of a thief spark a madcap cross-country rush to find some treasure.

Name: Fury
Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Brad Pitt, Shia LaBeouf, Logan Lerman
Outline: April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened Army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and his five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered, out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.

Name: The Guns of Navarone
Credit: Dir: J. Lee Thompson With: David Niven, Gregory Peck, Anthony Quinn
Outline: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

Name: Ip Man 2
Credit: Dir: Wilson Yip With: Donnie Yen, Xiaoming Huang, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
Outline: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

Name: Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct
Credit: Dir: Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet With: Vincent Cassel, CÃ©cile De France, GÃ©rard Depardieu
Outline: The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1.

Name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
Credit: Dir: John McTiernan With: Bruce Willis, Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson
Outline: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

Name: Midnight Run
Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto
Outline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.

Name: Lone Survivor
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Mark Wahlberg, Taylor Kitsch, Emile Hirsch
Outline: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

Name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
Credit: Dir: Rupert Wyatt With: James Franco, Andy Serkis, Freida Pinto
Outline: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

Name: Batman
Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger
Outline: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Name: House of Flying Daggers
Credit: Dir: Yimou Zhang With: Ziyi Zhang, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Andy Lau
Outline: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

Name: Star Trek: First Contact
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Frakes With: Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner
Outline: The Borg go back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

Name: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
Credit: Dir: Jim Jarmusch With: Forest Whitaker, Henry Silva, John Tormey
Outline: An African American mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.

Name: RoboCop
Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy
Outline: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

Name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Credit: Dir: Joss Whedon With: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
Outline: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

Name: Equilibrium
Credit: Dir: Kurt Wimmer With: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson
Outline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.

Name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
Credit: Dir: Edgar Wright With: Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Kieran Culkin
Outline: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.

Name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Jared Harris
Outline: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

Name: Undisputed 3: Redemption
Credit: Dir: Isaac Florentine With: Scott Adkins, Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Mark Ivanir
Outline: Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.

Name: Total Recall
Credit: Dir: Paul Verhoeven With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside
Outline: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

Name: X2
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
Outline: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

Name: Southpaw
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rachel McAdams, Oona Laurence
Outline: Boxer Billy Hope turns to trainer Tick Wills to help him get his life back on track after losing his wife in a tragic accident and his daughter to child protection services.

Name: From Russia with Love
Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Robert Shaw, Lotte Lenya
Outline: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

Name: Bullitt
Credit: Dir: Peter Yates With: Steve McQueen, Jacqueline Bisset, Robert Vaughn
Outline: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

Name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Jeremy Renner
Outline: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

Name: Running Scared
Credit: Dir: Wayne Kramer With: Paul Walker, Cameron Bright, Chazz Palminteri
Outline: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

Name: Looper
Credit: Dir: Rian Johnson With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Bruce Willis, Emily Blunt
Outline: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

Name: X-Men
Credit: Dir: Bryan Singer With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen
Outline: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.

Name: The Rock
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage, Ed Harris
Outline: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

Name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Credit: Dir: Peter Weir With: Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, Billy Boyd
Outline: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Name: Red Cliff
Credit: Dir: John Woo With: Tony Chiu Wai Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Fengyi Zhang
Outline: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

Name: Kung Fu Panda 3
Credit: Dir: Alessandro Carloni, Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Dustin Hoffman
Outline: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.

Name: Ant-Man
Credit: Dir: Peyton Reed With: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas, Corey Stoll
Outline: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

Name: Black Dynamite
Credit: Dir: Scott Sanders With: Arsenio Hall, Tommy Davidson, Phyllis Applegate
Outline: Black Dynamite is the greatest African-American action star of the 1970s. When his only brother is killed by The Man it's up to him to find justice.

Name: La Femme Nikita
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Anne Parillaud, Marc Duret, Patrick Fontana
Outline: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

Name: Assault on Precinct 13
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Austin Stoker, Darwin Joston, Laurie Zimmer
Outline: The isolated inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by the overwhelming numbers of a seemingly unstoppable street gang.

Name: The Baader Meinhof Complex
Credit: Dir: Uli Edel With: Martina Gedeck, Moritz Bleibtreu, Johanna Wokalek
Outline: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

Name: Conquest 1453
Credit: Dir: Faruk Aksoy With: Devrim Evin, Ibrahim Celikkol, Dilek Serbest
Outline: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.

Name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Tetsuya Nomura, Takeshi Nozue With: Takahiro Sakurai, Ayumi ItÃ´, Shotaro Morikubo
Outline: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

Name: The Animatrix
Credit: Dir: Peter Chung, Andrew R. Jones With: Clayton Watson, Akio Ãtsuka, Pamela Adlon
Outline: The Animatrix is a collection of several animated short films, detailing the backstory of the "Matrix" universe, and the original war between man and machines which led to the creation of the Matrix.

Name: The Italian Job
Credit: Dir: Peter Collinson With: Michael Caine, NoÃ«l Coward, Benny Hill
Outline: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

Name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg
Outline: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

Name: The Adventures of Tintin
Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis, Daniel Craig
Outline: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

Name: Fast Five
Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson
Outline: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

Name: Superman
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman
Outline: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

Name: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
Credit: Dir: Jee-woon Kim With: Kang-ho Song, Byung-hun Lee, Woo-sung Jung
Outline: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

Name: The Transformers: The Movie
Credit: Dir: Nelson Shin With: Orson Welles, Robert Stack, Leonard Nimoy
Outline: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Name: Ghajini
Credit: Dir: A.R. Murugadoss With: Aamir Khan, Asin, Jiah Khan
Outline: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
Outline: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

Name: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander
Outline: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

Name: Beverly Hills Cop
Credit: Dir: Martin Brest With: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton
Outline: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Name: RocknRolla
Credit: Dir: Guy Ritchie With: Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson, Idris Elba
Outline: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. While the city's seasoned criminals vie for the cash, an unexpected player -- a drugged out rock 'n' roller presumed to be dead but very much alive -- has a multi-million dollar prize fall into his hands.

Name: American Sniper
Genre: Action | Biography | Drama | History | Thriller | War
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Kyle Gallner
Outline: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

Name: Spider-Man 2
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina
Outline: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

Name: Big Trouble in Little China
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Kurt Russell, Kim Cattrall, Dennis Dun
Outline: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

Name: Shaolin Soccer
Credit: Dir: Stephen Chow With: Stephen Chow, Wei Zhao, Yat-Fei Wong
Outline: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

Name: Megamind
Credit: Dir: Tom McGrath With: Will Ferrell, Jonah Hill, Brad Pitt
Outline: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.

Name: Kung Fu Panda 2
Credit: Dir: Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Angelina Jolie, Jackie Chan
Outline: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

Name: Dr. No
Credit: Dir: Terence Young With: Sean Connery, Ursula Andress, Bernard Lee
Outline: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

Name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
Credit: Dir: Jamie Uys With: N!xau, Marius Weyers, Sandra Prinsloo
Outline: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

Name: Crimson Tide
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington, Matt Craven
Outline: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

Name: The Negotiator
Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey, David Morse
Outline: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

Name: Furious 7
Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson
Outline: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

Name: Enemy of the State
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight
Outline: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

Name: Face/Off
Credit: Dir: John Woo With: John Travolta, Nicolas Cage, Joan Allen
Outline: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a ruthless terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same criminal impersonates the cop.

Name: Ronin
Credit: Dir: John Frankenheimer With: Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone
Outline: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

Name: Spider-Man
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe
Outline: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

Name: Friday Night Lights
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Billy Bob Thornton, Jay Hernandez, Derek Luke
Outline: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

Name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams
Outline: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

Name: Iron Man 3
Credit: Dir: Shane Black With: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce, Gwyneth Paltrow
Outline: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

Name: Willow
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Warwick Davis
Outline: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

Name: King Kong
Credit: Dir: Peter Jackson With: Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody
Outline: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

Name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Credit: Dir: Nicholas Meyer With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

Name: Harry Brown
Credit: Dir: Daniel Barber With: Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer, David Bradley
Outline: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

Name: In the Line of Fire
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Petersen With: Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo
Outline: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

Name: True Lies
Credit: Dir: James Cameron With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold
Outline: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman.

Name: Ong-bak
Credit: Dir: Prachya Pinkaew With: Tony Jaa, Petchtai Wongkamlao, Pumwaree Yodkamol
Outline: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

Name: Kingdom of Heaven
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Orlando Bloom, Eva Green, Liam Neeson
Outline: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

Name: Team America: World Police
Credit: Dir: Trey Parker With: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Elle Russ
Outline: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

Name: Point Break
Credit: Dir: Kathryn Bigelow With: Patrick Swayze, Keanu Reeves, Gary Busey
Outline: An FBI agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

Name: 21 Jump Street
Credit: Dir: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller With: Jonah Hill, Channing Tatum, Ice Cube
Outline: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

Name: Highlander
Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Clancy Brown
Outline: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

Name: Live Free or Die Hard
Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Bruce Willis, Justin Long, Timothy Olyphant
Outline: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

Name: Escape from New York
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Kurt Russell, Lee Van Cleef, Ernest Borgnine
Outline: In 1997, when the US President crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

Name: The Equalizer
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz
Outline: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life. But when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters, he can't stand idly by - he has to help her.

Name: Lethal Weapon 2
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
Outline: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

Name: Silverado
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Kasdan With: Kevin Kline, Scott Glenn, Kevin Costner
Outline: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Name: District B13
Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Tony D'Amario
Outline: Set in the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

Name: GoldenEye
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Pierce Brosnan, Sean Bean, Izabella Scorupco
Outline: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow agent formerly believed to be dead.

Name: Defiance
Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell
Outline: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.

Name: Magnum Force
Credit: Dir: Ted Post With: Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan
Outline: Dirty Harry is on the trail of vigilante cops who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

Name: The Karate Kid
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue

Name: Men in Black 3
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin
Outline: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

Name: The Maze Runner
Credit: Dir: Wes Ball With: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario, Will Poulter
Outline: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

Name: Live and Let Die
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Seymour
Outline: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

Name: The Transporter
Credit: Dir: Louis Leterrier, Corey Yuen With: Jason Statham, Qi Shu, Matt Schulze
Outline: Frank is hired to "transport" packages for unknown clients and has made a very good living doing so. But when asked to move a package that begins moving, complications arise.

Name: Machine Gun Preacher
Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Gerard Butler, Michelle Monaghan, Michael Shannon
Outline: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

Name: TRON
Credit: Dir: Steven Lisberger With: Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner
Outline: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

Name: Con Air
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich
Outline: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

Name: Young Guns
Credit: Dir: Christopher Cain With: Emilio Estevez, Kiefer Sutherland, Lou Diamond Phillips
Outline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

Name: Street Kings
Credit: Dir: David Ayer With: Keanu Reeves, Forest Whitaker, Hugh Laurie
Outline: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the recent murder of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

Name: Who Am I?
Credit: Dir: Benny Chan, Jackie Chan With: Jackie Chan, Michelle Ferre, Mirai Yamamoto
Outline: A secret agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by a number of other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.

Name: Hanna
Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Saoirse Ronan, Cate Blanchett, Eric Bana
Outline: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

Name: Death Sentence
Credit: Dir: James Wan With: Kevin Bacon, John Goodman, Kelly Preston
Outline: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

Name: Heartbreak Ridge
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Marsha Mason, Everett McGill
Outline: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

Name: TRON: Legacy
Credit: Dir: Joseph Kosinski With: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde
Outline: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

Name: The A-Team
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley
Outline: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

Name: Superman II
Credit: Dir: Richard Lester With: Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder
Outline: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

Name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Michael J. Fox, Jim Varney, Corey Burton
Outline: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

Name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
Credit: Dir: Peter R. Hunt With: George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas
Outline: James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

Name: For Your Eyes Only
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol
Outline: Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

Name: Bloodsport
Credit: Dir: Newt Arnold With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres
Outline: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

Name: Pandorum
Credit: Dir: Christian Alvart With: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet
Outline: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

Name: The Grey
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo
Outline: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

Name: The Man with the Golden Gun
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Roger Moore, Christopher Lee, Britt Ekland
Outline: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

Name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
Credit: Dir: Marc Webb With: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx
Outline: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

Name: X-Men: The Last Stand
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Halle Berry
Outline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

Name: Safe House
Credit: Dir: Daniel Espinosa With: Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Patrick
Outline: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

Name: Unstoppable
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson
Outline: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

Name: The Enforcer
Credit: Dir: James Fargo With: Clint Eastwood, Tyne Daly, Harry Guardino
Outline: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

Name: No Escape
Credit: Dir: John Erick Dowdle With: Lake Bell, Pierce Brosnan, Owen Wilson
Outline: In their new overseas home, an American family soon finds themselves caught in the middle of a coup, and they frantically look for a safe escape from an environment where foreigners are being immediately executed.

Name: Underworld: Evolution
Credit: Dir: Len Wiseman With: Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Bill Nighy
Outline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

Name: Gangster Squad
Credit: Dir: Ruben Fleischer With: Sean Penn, Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone
Outline: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

Name: Escape Plan
Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, 50 Cent
Outline: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

Name: 2 Guns
Credit: Dir: Baltasar KormÃ¡kur With: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton
Outline: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

Name: Redirected
Credit: Dir: Emilis Velyvis With: Vinnie Jones, Scot Williams, Gil Darnell
Outline: Three friends try to make money and invite another friend in on a plot.

Name: Innerspace
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan
Outline: A hapless store clerk must foil criminals to save the life of the man who, miniaturized in a secret experiment, was accidentally injected into him.

Name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Geena Davis, Samuel L. Jackson, Yvonne Zima
Outline: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

Name: The Way of the Gun
Credit: Dir: Christopher McQuarrie With: Ryan Phillippe, Benicio Del Toro, Juliette Lewis
Outline: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

Name: Shoot 'Em Up
Credit: Dir: Michael Davis With: Clive Owen, Monica Bellucci, Paul Giamatti
Outline: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.

Name: The Mask of Zorro
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Romance | Thriller | Western
Credit: Dir: Martin Campbell With: Antonio Banderas, Anthony Hopkins, Catherine Zeta-Jones
Outline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

Name: Rumble in the Bronx
Credit: Dir: Stanley Tong With: Jackie Chan, Anita Mui, FranÃ§oise Yip
Outline: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

Name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Credit: Dir: Steve Barron With: Judith Hoag, Elias Koteas, Josh Pais
Outline: A group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.

Name: The Matrix Revolutions
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
Outline: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

Name: The Wolverine
Credit: Dir: James Mangold With: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto
Outline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

Name: Backdraft
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro
Outline: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

Name: Hot Shots!
Credit: Dir: Jim Abrahams With: Charlie Sheen, Cary Elwes, Valeria Golino
Outline: A parody of Top Gun in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

Name: Resident Evil
Credit: Dir: Paul W.S. Anderson With: Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Ryan McCluskey
Outline: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

Name: Nothing to Lose
Credit: Dir: Steve Oedekerk With: Martin Lawrence, Tim Robbins, John C. McGinley
Outline: Nick Beam's life couldn't get any worse. He discovers he has been living a lie and is on the verge of a nervous breakdown...

Name: Wanted
Credit: Dir: Timur Bekmambetov With: Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy, Morgan Freeman
Outline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

Name: The Living Daylights
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Maryam d'Abo, Jeroen KrabbÃ©
Outline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

Name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer
Outline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

Name: The Last Starfighter
Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Lance Guest, Robert Preston, Kay E. Kuter
Outline: A discouraged video-gaming boy finds himself recruited as a gunner for an alien defense force.

Name: The Rundown
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken
Outline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

Name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds
Outline: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.

Name: Conspiracy Theory
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart
Outline: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

Name: Lethal Weapon 3
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
Outline: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue an arms dealer who is a former LAPD officer.

Name: The Fast and the Furious
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Name: Absolute Power
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris
Outline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

Name: Smokin' Aces
Credit: Dir: Joe Carnahan With: Jeremy Piven, Ryan Reynolds, Ray Liotta
Outline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

Name: The Bourne Legacy
Credit: Dir: Tony Gilroy With: Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz, Edward Norton
Outline: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

Name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
Credit: Dir: George Lucas With: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor
Outline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with PadmÃ©, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

Name: Ender's Game
Credit: Dir: Gavin Hood With: Harrison Ford, Asa Butterfield, Hailee Steinfeld
Outline: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion.

Name: The Chronicles of Riddick
Credit: Dir: David Twohy With: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
Outline: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

Name: Commando
Credit: Dir: Mark L. Lester With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Dan Hedaya
Outline: A retired elite Black Ops Commando launches a one man war against a group of South American criminals who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into starting a revolution and getting an exiled dictator back into power.

Name: Diamonds Are Forever
Credit: Dir: Guy Hamilton With: Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray
Outline: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

Name: Puss in Boots
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
Credit: Dir: Chris Miller With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis
Outline: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.

Name: Robin Hood
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Russell Crowe, Cate Blanchett, Matthew Macfadyen
Outline: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

Name: In Time
Credit: Dir: Andrew Niccol With: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Murphy
Outline: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

Name: Machete
Credit: Dir: Ethan Maniquis, Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro
Outline: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
Credit: Dir: Rob Marshall With: Johnny Depp, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Ian McShane
Outline: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

Name: The Expendables 2
Credit: Dir: Simon West With: Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture
Outline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

Name: Blade II
Credit: Dir: Guillermo del Toro With: Wesley Snipes, Kris Kristofferson, Ron Perlman
Outline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

Name: RED 2
Credit: Dir: Dean Parisot With: Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich
Outline: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

Name: Quantum of Solace
Credit: Dir: Marc Forster With: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric
Outline: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organization from eliminating a country's most valuable resource. All the while, he still tries to seek revenge over the death of his love.

Name: Hidalgo
Credit: Dir: Joe Johnston With: Viggo Mortensen, Omar Sharif, Zuleikha Robinson
Outline: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

Name: The Other Guys
Credit: Dir: Adam McKay With: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Derek Jeter
Outline: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops whom they idolize -- only things don't quite go as planned.

Name: Fast & Furious
Credit: Dir: Justin Lin With: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

Name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Credit: Dir: Leonard Nimoy With: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
Outline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

Name: Elysium
Credit: Dir: Neill Blomkamp With: Matt Damon, Jodie Foster, Sharlto Copley
Outline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Name: The Running Man
Credit: Dir: Paul Michael Glaser With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Maria Conchita Alonso, Yaphet Kotto
Outline: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

Name: Black Rain
Credit: Dir: Ridley Scott With: Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia, Ken Takakura
Outline: Two NYC cops arrest a Yakuza member and must escort him when he's extradited to Japan.

Name: Terminator Salvation
Credit: Dir: McG With: Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Anton Yelchin
Outline: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

Name: Wasabi
Credit: Dir: GÃ©rard Krawczyk With: Jean Reno, RyÃ´ko Hirosue, Michel Muller
Outline: Hubert is a French policeman with very sharp methods. After being forced to take 2 months off by his boss...

Name: The Heat
Credit: Dir: Paul Feig With: Sandra Bullock, Michael McDonald, Melissa McCarthy
Outline: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

Name: Sudden Impact
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle
Outline: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

Name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Credit: Dir: Jay Roach With: Mike Myers, Heather Graham, Michael York
Outline: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Name: Kick-Ass 2
Credit: Dir: Jeff Wadlow With: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
Outline: Following Kick-Ass's heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But the Red Mist leads his own group of evil super-villains to kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything for which he stands.

Name: Attack the Block
Credit: Dir: Joe Cornish With: John Boyega, Jodie Whittaker, Alex Esmail
Outline: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

Name: Man on a Ledge
Credit: Dir: Asger Leth With: Sam Worthington, Elizabeth Banks, Jamie Bell
Outline: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

Name: Tears of the Sun
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Bruce Willis, Cole Hauser, Monica Bellucci
Outline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

Name: Vantage Point
Credit: Dir: Pete Travis With: Dennis Quaid, Forest Whitaker, Matthew Fox
Outline: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

Name: The Recruit
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan
Outline: A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.

Name: Lethal Weapon 4
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci
Outline: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with a deadly Chinese crimelord trying to get his brother out of prison.

Name: Armageddon
Credit: Dir: Michael Bay With: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck
Outline: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

Name: The Forbidden Kingdom
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Jackie Chan, Jet Li, Michael Angarano
Outline: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Credit: Dir: Mike Newell With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton, Ben Kingsley
Outline: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Name: Eagle Eye
Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan, Rosario Dawson
Outline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

Name: 16 Blocks
Credit: Dir: Richard Donner With: Bruce Willis, Yasiin Bey, David Morse
Outline: An aging alcoholic cop is assigned the task of escorting a witness from police custody to a courthouse 16 blocks away. There are, however, chaotic forces at work that prevent them from making it in one piece.

Name: Kiss of the Dragon
Credit: Dir: Chris Nahon With: Jet Li, Bridget Fonda, TchÃ©ky Karyo
Outline: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Name: Courage Under Fire
Credit: Dir: Edward Zwick With: Denzel Washington, Meg Ryan, Lou Diamond Phillips
Outline: A US Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

Name: Christine
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Keith Gordon, John Stockwell, Alexandra Paul
Outline: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

Name: Spartan
Credit: Dir: David Mamet With: Val Kilmer, Derek Luke, William H. Macy
Outline: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

Name: Om Shanti Om
Genre: Action | Comedy | Drama | Musical | Romance | Thriller
Credit: Dir: Farah Khan With: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Arjun Rampal
Outline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

Name: Demolition Man
Credit: Dir: Marco Brambilla With: Sylvester Stallone, Wesley Snipes, Sandra Bullock
Outline: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

Name: Licence to Kill
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Timothy Dalton, Robert Davi, Carey Lowell
Outline: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

Name: John Carter
Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton With: Taylor Kitsch, Lynn Collins, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

Name: Titan A.E.
Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Matt Damon, Drew Barrymore, Bill Pullman
Outline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Name: Dune
Credit: Dir: David Lynch With: Kyle MacLachlan, Virginia Madsen, Francesca Annis
Outline: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

Name: Never Back Down
Credit: Dir: Jeff Wadlow With: Sean Faris, Djimon Hounsou, Amber Heard
Outline: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new highschool to discover an underground fightclub and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

Name: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
Credit: Dir: Patrick Tatopoulos With: Rhona Mitra, Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy
Outline: An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

Name: Rush Hour 2
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone
Outline: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

Name: Terminator Genisys
Credit: Dir: Alan Taylor With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke
Outline: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

Name: Star Trek: Generations
Credit: Dir: David Carson With: Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell
Outline: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

Name: Hostage
Credit: Dir: Florent-Emilio Siri With: Bruce Willis, Kevin Pollak, Serena Scott Thomas
Outline: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

Name: Octopussy
Credit: Dir: John Glen With: Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan
Outline: A fake FabergÃ© egg and a fellow agent's death lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

Name: U-571

Name: King Arthur

Outline: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Name: Johnny English Reborn

Name: Resident Evil: Extinction

Name: Total Recall

Name: After the Sunset

Outline: The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the FBI agent who promised he'd capture him is about to do just that.

Name: The November Man

Name: Blue Streak

Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

Name: 47 Ronin

Name: 300: Rise of an Empire

Name: Rising Sun

Name: Never Say Never Again

Name: The Devil's Own

Name: The Tournament

Name: Loaded Weapon 1
Credit: Dir: Gene Quintano With: Emilio Estevez, Samuel L. Jackson, Jon Lovitz
Outline: An LA detective is murdered because she has microfilm with the recipe to make cocaine cookies. A "Lethal...

Name: Flight of the Phoenix
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Dennis Quaid, Miranda Otto, Giovanni Ribisi
Outline: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

Name: 15 Minutes

Name: Man of Tai Chi

Outline: A young martial artist's unparalleled Tai Chi skills land him in a highly lucrative underworld fight club.

Name: Automata
Credit: Dir: Gabe IbÃ¡Ã±ez With: Antonio Banderas, Birgitte Hjort SÃ¸rensen, Dylan McDermott
Outline: Jacq Vaucan is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves. What he discovers will have profound consequences for the future of humanity.

Name: American Ultra

En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.
