Name: After Earth
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Jaden Smith, David Denman, Will Smith
Outline: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

Name: The Darkest Hour
Credit: Dir: Chris Gorak With: Emile Hirsch, Olivia Thirlby, Max Minghella
Outline: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

Name: Ghosts of Mars
Credit: Dir: John Carpenter With: Natasha Henstridge, Ice Cube, Pam Grier
Outline: Years in the future, a Martian police unit is sent to pick up a highly dangerous criminal at a remote mining post. Upon arrival, the cops find that the post has become a charnel house.

Name: The Phantom
Credit: Dir: Simon Wincer With: Billy Zane, Kristy Swanson, Treat Williams
Outline: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.

Name: Dracula 2000
Credit: Dir: Patrick Lussier With: Gerard Butler, Justine Waddell, Jonny Lee Miller
Outline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
Credit: Dir: McG With: Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Cameron Diaz
Outline: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

Name: Wild Wild West
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Will Smith, Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh
Outline: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

Name: The Spirit
Credit: Dir: Frank Miller With: Gabriel Macht, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Name: DOA: Dead or Alive
Credit: Dir: Corey Yuen With: Jaime Pressly, Devon Aoki, Sarah Carter
Outline: The movie adaptation of the best selling video game series Dead or Alive.

Name: Ra.One
Credit: Dir: Anubhav Sinha With: Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, Kareena Kapoor
Outline: A video game developer's world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation becomes all too real.

Name: Elektra
Credit: Dir: Rob Bowman With: Jennifer Garner, Goran Visnjic, Will Yun Lee
Outline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

Name: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
Credit: Dir: Colin Strause, Greg Strause With: Reiko Aylesworth, Steven Pasquale, Shareeka Epps
Outline: Warring alien and predator races descend on a small town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

Name: The Marine
Credit: Dir: John Bonito With: John Cena, Kelly Carlson, Robert Patrick
Outline: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.

Name: Jonah Hex
Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward With: Josh Brolin, Megan Fox, John Malkovich
Outline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

Name: Howard the Duck
Credit: Dir: Willard Huyck With: Lea Thompson, Jeffrey Jones, Tim Robbins
Outline: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.

Name: Superhero Movie
Credit: Dir: Craig Mazin With: Drake Bell, Leslie Nielsen, Sara Paxton
Outline: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.

Name: Driven
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Sylvester Stallone, Kip Pardue, Til Schweiger
Outline: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

Name: Ultraviolet
Credit: Dir: Kurt Wimmer With: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund
Outline: A beautiful hemophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hemophages.

Name: Taxi
Credit: Dir: Tim Story With: Queen Latifah, Jimmy Fallon, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen
Outline: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

Name: Skyline
Credit: Dir: Colin Strause, Greg Strause With: Eric Balfour, Donald Faison, Scottie Thompson
Outline: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

Name: Fantastic Four
Credit: Dir: Josh Trank With: Miles Teller, Kate Mara, Michael B. Jordan
Outline: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

Name: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
Credit: Dir: Mark Neveldine, Brian Taylor With: Nicolas Cage, CiarÃ¡n Hinds, Idris Elba
Outline: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.

Name: xXx: State of the Union
Credit: Dir: Lee Tamahori With: Ice Cube, Samuel L. Jackson, Willem Dafoe
Outline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

Name: The Last Airbender
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
Outline: Follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must master all four elements and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water Tribes and the Earth Kingdom.

Name: The Legend of Hercules
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Kellan Lutz, Gaia Weiss, Scott Adkins
Outline: The origin story of the the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

Name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Daryl Sabara, Alexa PenaVega, Antonio Banderas
Outline: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Name: Inspector Gadget
Credit: Dir: David Kellogg With: Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett, Joely Fisher
Outline: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

Name: Highlander II: The Quickening
Credit: Dir: Russell Mulcahy With: Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen
Outline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

Name: Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot
Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Sylvester Stallone, Estelle Getty, JoBeth Williams
Outline: A tough police sergeant's mother comes to visit him and begins to meddle in his life and career.

Name: RoboCop 3
Credit: Dir: Fred Dekker With: Nancy Allen, Robert John Burke, Mario Machado
Outline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

Name: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Jason Statham, Ron Perlman, Ray Liotta
Outline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

Name: Street Fighter
Credit: Dir: Steven E. de Souza With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Ming-Na Wen
Outline: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

Name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric, Willem Dafoe
Outline: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Name: The Avengers
Credit: Dir: Jeremiah S. Chechik With: Ralph Fiennes, Uma Thurman, Sean Connery
Outline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

Name: Batman & Robin
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, George Clooney, Chris O'Donnell
Outline: Batman & Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

Name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Robin Shou, Talisa Soto, James Remar
Outline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

Name: Dungeons & Dragons
Credit: Dir: Courtney Solomon With: Justin Whalin, Jeremy Irons, Zoe McLellan
Outline: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Credit: Dir: Sidney J. Furie With: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder
Outline: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

Name: Catwoman
Credit: Dir: Pitof With: Halle Berry, Sharon Stone, Benjamin Bratt
Outline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

Name: BloodRayne
Credit: Dir: Uwe Boll With: Kristanna Loken, Ben Kingsley, Michelle Rodriguez
Outline: In the 18th century, a vampire escapes from the freak show she once participated in and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

Name: Dragonball: Evolution
Credit: Dir: James Wong With: Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Yun-Fat Chow
Outline: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

Name: Battlefield Earth
Credit: Dir: Roger Christian With: John Travolta, Forest Whitaker, Barry Pepper
Outline: After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

Name: Gunday
Credit: Dir: Ali Abbas Zafar With: Ranveer Singh, Arjun Kapoor, Priyanka Chopra
Outline: Two childhood friends travel from Bangladesh to Calcutta during the turbulent 1970s, becoming criminal superstars who both fall for a cabaret dancer.
